Package org.bukkit.block

Interface Beehive

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockState, EntityBlockStorage<Bee>, Metadatable, PersistentDataHolder, TileState

    public interface Beehive
extends EntityBlockStorage<Bee>
    Represents a captured state of a bee hive.
